tweet.text:
How ENTRY actually uses AI to prevent on-chain risk üîí AI-driven safety meets ZK-powered privacy.

ENTRY‚Äôs compliance AI does more than just ‚Äúscan transactions‚Äù. It continuously evaluates users, wallets, and asset behavior using three core systems:

1. AI-powered risk & watchtower monitoring
Real-time screening and updates on sanctions exposure, PEP, adverse media, risky activity, expired documents, and residency changes.  

2. LLM-driven compliance checks
Our AI thinks like a regulator, and evaluates users, companies, stakeholders, and transactions, producing verifiable, compliant decisions.

3. Immutable auditability
ENTRY automatically generates tamper-proof audit trails, producing verifiable cryptographic evidence.

tweet.text:
The risk of having a world where AGI is closed and wielded by a few big centralized entities is just too high‚Äî@sandeepnailwal‚Äôs vision challenges this.

The hypothesis: building a collaborative foundation of open source AI tech stack that accelerates progress toward secure, and composable high-level reasoning intelligence, will foster a future where AGI serves and enhances humanity.

This is Sentient.

tweet.text:
x402 Alignment map: Key players to watch ‚Üì

The x402 protocol experienced a 10,780% surge in transactions over one week in October 2025, processing nearly 500,000 payments.

Before x402:
‚Ä¢ AI agents needed API keys (security risk)
‚Ä¢ Subscription models (inefficient for sporadic use)
‚Ä¢ Manual payment setup (kills automation)
‚Ä¢ Credit cards (friction, fees, geographic limits)

After x402:
‚Ä¢ AI agents pay autonomously with stablecoins (USDC)
‚Ä¢ Pay-per-request model (perfect for micropayments)
‚Ä¢ Zero manual intervention (true automation)
‚Ä¢ Internet-native (works globally, near-zero fees)

Why this is bigger than it looks:

‚Ä¢ As AI agents become more autonomous, they need a way to transact. x402 is the payment rail for this economy.

‚Ä¢ x402 uses USDC and other stablecoins, driving real-world crypto utility beyond speculation.

‚Ä¢ Institutional Backing  Coinbase, Cloudflare, Google Cloud, PayPal Ventures, General Catalyst ‚Äì this isn't a degen play. This is infrastructure-grade tech.

***

BEST ALIGNED | WEB3:
‚Ä¢ @coinbase
‚Ä¢ @base
‚Ä¢ @GoKiteAI
‚Ä¢ @ChainbaseHQ
‚Ä¢ @playAInetwork

ALIGNED | WEB3:
‚Ä¢ @eigenlayer
‚Ä¢ @Mantle_Official
‚Ä¢ @peaq
‚Ä¢ @Gate
‚Ä¢ @Cardano

PARTIALLY ALIGNED:
‚Ä¢ @pieverse_io
‚Ä¢ @olaxbt
